oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Army of the Republic badge of Sgt. John H. Jennings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Grand Army of the Republic badge of Sgt. John H. Jennings, Co., 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA. Jennings was from Decatur County, Tenn. and enlisted in the Union Army in April 1864 at Clifton, Tenn. He was quickly promoted to sergeant and served as such until discharged in May 1865. He started the Farmers Bank in Parsons, Tenn. after the war. The 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA was composed of primarily of Tennessee Unionist from along the Tennessee River.
